Summary Note:
The RM first met Juliette Camille Roose at a luxury car show in Brussels. They both admired the latest models and discussed their interest in high-end investments, leading to a productive business relationship.
With a career spanning nearly 28 years, Juliette Camille Roose has established herself as a key player in the industry.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Juliette Camille Roose has been happily married to Dumont since 2006. They are proud parents of 1 child: Smets.
Education Background:
Juliette received her secondary school diploma from Lycée Molière in 1992.
Juliette pursued higher education at University of Liège, graduating in 1997.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 28 years, Juliette Camille Roose has established herself as a key player in the industry.
In 1997, Juliette Camille Roose started working as a Investment Banker at BNP Paribas Fortis SA/NV, marking the beginning of her successful career.
In 2001, she moved to Euroclear SA/NV to work as a Private Equity Investor, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 400000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has flat located in Charleroi, worth 1020000 EUR.

She inherited a significant sum of 4610000 EUR from her mother, a respected Tech Entrepreneur, in 2005, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
